sentence: "Donald Trump Jr.s recent comments invoking the use of gas chambers to make a political attack show just how insensitive divisive and reckless the Trump campaign is
The bottom line is this — xa0offensive references to the Holocaust are never acceptable especially from a Presidential campaign
This is just the latest string of outrageous comments and offensive actions from the Trump campaign

From imposing a Star of David over a sea of dollar bills in a widely shared graphic retweeting anti-Semitic white supremacists to remarks hes made using anti-Semitic stereotypes — the Trump campaign has shown us exactly the type of campaign they are running time and time again and this campaign will continue to hold them accountable."
